#!/bin/ash
# Bastion Bot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

## Install Requirements
apk --no-cache add python g++ make git

## Move to install folder
cd /mnt/server/

## Clone repo
git clone -b stable -q --depth 1 https://github.com/TheBastionBot/Bastion.git ./

## Install node_modules
yarn install --only=production

## Move config files.
mv settings/credentials.example.yaml settings/credentials.yaml
mv settings/configurations.example.yaml settings/configurations.yaml
